trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The spiderdragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spiderdragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spiderdragon ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spiderdragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spiderling Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The spiderdragon exhales venomous spiderlings in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) piercing damage and 33 ({@damage 6d10}) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
